  <script type="text/javascript">
    
  function CheckColors(val){
 var element=document.getElementById('otherAreaBlock');
 var textElement = document.getElementById('MC_Other_Area_of_Interest__c');
 if(val=='Other (captured in Other Area of Interest)'){
   element.style.display='block';
   $('#MC_Other_Area_of_Interest__c').prop('required',true);
 }else{ 
   element.style.display='none';
   $('#MC_Other_Area_of_Interest__c').prop('required',false);
 }
} 
   
  function displayOtherBlock(val){
   var element=document.getElementById('otherBlock');
    var textElement=document.getElementById('childInput');
   if(val=='Other'){
     element.style.display='block';
     
     $('#childInput').prop('required',true);
   }else{  
     element.style.display='none';
    $('#childInput').prop('required',false);
   }
 } 
    
</script>

<script>



var form = document.getElementById('progForm');

$(document).ready(function() {
  $('#submit').click(function() {

   var reqFieldsCount = 0;
   var compFieldsCount = 0;
   var countCheckboxes = 0;
   var compCheckboxCount = 0;
    
   for(var i=0; i < form.elements.length; i++){
      // count all required fields on curr page
      if (form.elements[i].hasAttribute('required')) {

         reqFieldsCount += 1;
      }
      // count completed fields
      if(form.elements[i].value != '' && form.elements[i].hasAttribute('required')){

        //console.log('completed form.elements[i].value: ' + form.elements[i].value );
         //at least 1 checkbox field

         //count checkbox fields
         if (form.elements[i].type == 'checkbox') {
            countCheckboxes +=1
         }


         if (form.elements[i].type == 'checkbox' && form.elements[i].checked == true) { // checkbox fields
            compCheckboxCount +=1

         } else if (form.elements[i].type != 'checkbox') { // other fields
            compFieldsCount += 1;              
         }

       }
    }

   // add diff of unchecked checkboxes, as only 1 is required
   if (compCheckboxCount>0){
      compFieldsCount += (countCheckboxes - compCheckboxCount) + compCheckboxCount;  
   }

    // console.log('form.elements.length: ' + form.elements.length );
    // console.log('countCheckboxes: ' + countCheckboxes );
    // console.log('compCheckboxCount: ' + compCheckboxCount );
    // console.log('reqFieldsCount: ' + reqFieldsCount);
    // console.log('compFieldsCount: ' + compFieldsCount);

   // only post if all req fields are completed
   if (reqFieldsCount===compFieldsCount) { 

   // remove duplicate names for checkboxes and combine to single field

   var checkboxNames = ['MC_Conversion_Type__c']
   var c;

    for (c of checkboxNames) {

      var checkboxName = c;
      console.log('checkbox: '+ checkboxName);

      var productTypes = document.forms['progForm'].elements[checkboxName];

      var val = '';
      
      for (var i=0, len=productTypes.length; i<len; i++) {
          var id = checkboxName+'-'+(i+1);
          var checkbox = document.getElementById(id);
          $('.checkbox').addClass('submitting');
              checkbox.parentNode.removeChild(checkbox); 
          if (checkbox.checked==true) {
            val += checkbox.value + ';';
          }

      }

      var input = document.createElement('input');
      input.type ='hidden'
      input.name = c
      input.value = val;
      form.appendChild(input);

    }
     
     // Ankit Changes
    var otherChallenges =  document.getElementById("childInput").value;
    var mainChallenges =  document.getElementById("MC_Main_Challenges__c").value;
    console.log("mainChallenges: ",mainChallenges);
    console.log("otherChallenges: ",otherChallenges);
      if(otherChallenges == null || otherChallenges == '' || mainChallenges != "Other"){
         var element = document.getElementById("parentInput");
          var child=document.getElementById("childInput");
          element.removeChild(child);
      }else if(mainChallenges == "Other" && (otherChallenges != null || otherChallenges != '')){
        console.log("Inside this");
        var element = document.getElementById("MC_Main_Challenges__c");
         element.parentNode.removeChild(element);
      }
     
     // Changes end
      
    $('#submit').attr('disabled', true).val('Submitting').fadeTo('fast', 0.6);

    //stop form validation as this is false/positive for checkbox
    $("#progForm").attr('novalidate', 'novalidate');

    var formData = $('#progForm').serialize();
    //console.log('Posting the following: ' + formData);

    postFormData(formData);

    }

  })

})



function validateEmail(emailField){
        var reg = /^([A-Za-z0-9_\-\.\+])+\@([A-Za-z0-9_\-\.])+\.([A-Za-z]{2,4})$/;

        if (reg.test(emailField.value) == false) 
        {
            return false;
        }

        return true;

}

function postFormData(formData) {

   var emailSw =    document.getElementById('emailField').value;  
 console.log('formData: ' + JSON.stringify(formData));
  $.ajax({
     url: '<ctrl:var name="formHandler" />?m=postData',
     data: formData,
     type: 'post',
     dataType: 'json',
     success: function(data) {

        console.log('result: ' + JSON.stringify(data));
        
        if (data.redirectUrl) { // last page
            _satellite.track("USPolymersFormComplete", {
                                    email: emailSw // xxxx should be replaced by email ID
                      });
           $('html').hide();
           window.location.replace(data.redirectUrl);
        } else {

        //window.scrollTo(0, 0); // scroll to top
        if (data.sk) {
           $('#sk').val(data.sk); //for resolved records
        }
        if (data.createLeadEmail) {
           $('#createLeadEmail').val(data.createLeadEmail); // temp store to create Lead record
        }
          
        $('#FirstName').val(data.displayFields[0].fieldValue);
        $('#LastName').val(data.displayFields[1].fieldValue);
        $('#currPage').val(1); // update currPage

        for (var obj in data.displayFields) {

          var field = data.displayFields[obj];
          var fieldName = field.fieldName;

          $('.' + fieldName).show();
          $('.' + fieldName).prop('required',true);
         // $('#emailConsent').prop('required',true);
        
    
        }
        $('#msg').show();
        $('#msg').text(data.message);

        if ($('#currPage').val()==1) {
           $('.consent').show();
           $('.unsubscribe').show();
           $('#submit').show();
        }

       }

      }

   })

}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">_satellite.pageBottom();</script>
     

  
    </body>
</html>

   for(var i=0; i < form.elements.length; i++){
      // count all required fields on curr page

         reqFieldsCount += 1;
      }
      // count completed fields
      if(form.elements[i].value != '' && form.elements[i].hasAttribute('required')){

        //console.log('completed form.elements[i].value: ' + form.elements[i].value );
         //at least 1 checkbox field

         //count checkbox fields
         if (form.elements[i].type == 'checkbox') {
            countCheckboxes +=1
         }


         if (form.elements[i].type == 'checkbox' && form.elements[i].checked == true) { // checkbox fields
            compCheckboxCount +=1

         } else if (form.elements[i].type != 'checkbox') { // other fields
            compFieldsCount += 1;              
         }

       }
    }

   // add diff of unchecked checkboxes, as only 1 is required
   if (compCheckboxCount>0){
      compFieldsCount += (countCheckboxes - compCheckboxCount) + compCheckboxCount;  
   }

    // console.log('form.elements.length: ' + form.elements.length );
    // console.log('countCheckboxes: ' + countCheckboxes );
    // console.log('compCheckboxCount: ' + compCheckboxCount );
    // console.log('reqFieldsCount: ' + reqFieldsCount);
    // console.log('compFieldsCount: ' + compFieldsCount);

   // only post if all req fields are completed
   if (reqFieldsCount===compFieldsCount) { 

   // remove duplicate names for checkboxes and combine to single field

   var checkboxNames = ['MC_Conversion_Type__c']
   var c;

    for (c of checkboxNames) {

      var checkboxName = c;
      console.log('checkbox: '+ checkboxName);

      var productTypes = document.forms['progForm'].elements[checkboxName];

      var val = '';
      
      for (var i=0, len=productTypes.length; i<len; i++) {
          var id = checkboxName+'-'+(i+1);
          var checkbox = document.getElementById(id);
          $('.checkbox').addClass('submitting');
              checkbox.parentNode.removeChild(checkbox); 
          if (checkbox.checked==true) {
            val += checkbox.value + ';';
          }

      }

      var input = document.createElement('input');
      input.type ='hidden'
      input.name = c
      input.value = val;
      form.appendChild(input);

    }
     
     // Ankit Changes
    var otherChallenges =  document.getElementById("childInput").value;
    var mainChallenges =  document.getElementById("MC_Main_Challenges__c").value;
    console.log("mainChallenges: ",mainChallenges);
    console.log("otherChallenges: ",otherChallenges);
      if(otherChallenges == null || otherChallenges == '' || mainChallenges != "Other"){
         var element = document.getElementById("parentInput");
          var child=document.getElementById("childInput");
          element.removeChild(child);
      }else if(mainChallenges == "Other" && (otherChallenges != null || otherChallenges != '')){
        console.log("Inside this");
        var element = document.getElementById("MC_Main_Challenges__c");
         element.parentNode.removeChild(element);
      }
     
     // Changes end
      
    $('#submit').attr('disabled', true).val('Submitting').fadeTo('fast', 0.6);

    //stop form validation as this is false/positive for checkbox
    $("#progForm").attr('novalidate', 'novalidate');

    var formData = $('#progForm').serialize();
    //console.log('Posting the following: ' + formData);

    postFormData(formData);

    }

  })

})



function validateEmail(emailField){
        var reg = /^([A-Za-z0-9_\-\.\+])+\@([A-Za-z0-9_\-\.])+\.([A-Za-z]{2,4})$/;

        if (reg.test(emailField.value) == false) 
        {
            return false;
        }

        return true;

}

function postFormData(formData) {

   var emailSw =    document.getElementById('emailField').value;  
 console.log('formData: ' + JSON.stringify(formData));
  $.ajax({
     url: '<ctrl:var name="formHandler" />?m=postData',
     data: formData,
     type: 'post',
     dataType: 'json',
     success: function(data) {

        console.log('result: ' + JSON.stringify(data));
        
        if (data.redirectUrl) { // last page
            _satellite.track("USPolymersFormComplete", {
                                    email: emailSw // xxxx should be replaced by email ID
                      });
           $('html').hide();
           window.location.replace(data.redirectUrl);
        } else {

        //window.scrollTo(0, 0); // scroll to top
        if (data.sk) {
           $('#sk').val(data.sk); //for resolved records
        }
        if (data.createLeadEmail) {
           $('#createLeadEmail').val(data.createLeadEmail); // temp store to create Lead record
        }
          
        $('#FirstName').val(data.displayFields[0].fieldValue);
        $('#LastName').val(data.displayFields[1].fieldValue);
        $('#currPage').val(1); // update currPage

        for (var obj in data.displayFields) {

          var field = data.displayFields[obj];
          var fieldName = field.fieldName;

          $('.' + fieldName).show();
          $('.' + fieldName).prop('required',true);
         // $('#emailConsent').prop('required',true);
        
    
        }
        $('#msg').show();
        $('#msg').text(data.message);

        if ($('#currPage').val()==1) {
           $('.consent').show();
           $('.unsubscribe').show();
           $('#submit').show();
        }

       }

      }

   })

}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">_satellite.pageBottom();</script>
     

  
    </body>
</html>

<script>



var form = document.getElementById('progForm');

$(document).ready(function() {
  $('#submit').click(function() {

   var reqFieldsCount = 0;
   var compFieldsCount = 0;
   var countCheckboxes = 0;
   var compCheckboxCount = 0;
    
   for(var i=0; i < form.elements.length; i++){
      // count all required fields on curr page
      if (form.elements[i].hasAttribute('required')) {

         reqFieldsCount += 1;
      }
      // count completed fields
      if(form.elements[i].value != '' && form.elements[i].hasAttribute('required')){

        //console.log('completed form.elements[i].value: ' + form.elements[i].value );
         //at least 1 checkbox field

         //count checkbox fields
         if (form.elements[i].type == 'checkbox') {
            countCheckboxes +=1
         }


         if (form.elements[i].type == 'checkbox' && form.elements[i].checked == true) { // checkbox fields
            compCheckboxCount +=1

         } else if (form.elements[i].type != 'checkbox') { // other fields
            compFieldsCount += 1;              
         }

       }
    }

   // add diff of unchecked checkboxes, as only 1 is required
   if (compCheckboxCount>0){
      compFieldsCount += (countCheckboxes - compCheckboxCount) + compCheckboxCount;  
   }

    // console.log('form.elements.length: ' + form.elements.length );
    // console.log('countCheckboxes: ' + countCheckboxes );
    // console.log('compCheckboxCount: ' + compCheckboxCount );
    // console.log('reqFieldsCount: ' + reqFieldsCount);
    // console.log('compFieldsCount: ' + compFieldsCount);

   // only post if all req fields are completed
   if (reqFieldsCount===compFieldsCount) { 

   // remove duplicate names for checkboxes and combine to single field

   var checkboxNames = ['MC_Conversion_Type__c']
   var c;

    for (c of checkboxNames) {

      var checkboxName = c;
      console.log('checkbox: '+ checkboxName);

      var productTypes = document.forms['progForm'].elements[checkboxName];

      var val = '';
      
      for (var i=0, len=productTypes.length; i<len; i++) {
          var id = checkboxName+'-'+(i+1);
          var checkbox = document.getElementById(id);
          $('.checkbox').addClass('submitting');
              checkbox.parentNode.removeChild(checkbox); 
          if (checkbox.checked==true) {
            val += checkbox.value + ';';
          }

      }

      var input = document.createElement('input');
      input.type ='hidden'
      input.name = c
      input.value = val;
      form.appendChild(input);

    }
     
     // Ankit Changes
    var otherChallenges =  document.getElementById("childInput").value;
    var mainChallenges =  document.getElementById("MC_Main_Challenges__c").value;
    console.log("mainChallenges: ",mainChallenges);
    console.log("otherChallenges: ",otherChallenges);
      if(otherChallenges == null || otherChallenges == '' || mainChallenges != "Other"){
         var element = document.getElementById("parentInput");
          var child=document.getElementById("childInput");
          element.removeChild(child);
      }else if(mainChallenges == "Other" && (otherChallenges != null || otherChallenges != '')){
        console.log("Inside this");
        var element = document.getElementById("MC_Main_Challenges__c");
         element.parentNode.removeChild(element);
      }
     
     // Changes end
      
    $('#submit').attr('disabled', true).val('Submitting').fadeTo('fast', 0.6);

    //stop form validation as this is false/positive for checkbox
    $("#progForm").attr('novalidate', 'novalidate');

    var formData = $('#progForm').serialize();
    //console.log('Posting the following: ' + formData);

    postFormData(formData);

    }

  })

})



function validateEmail(emailField){
        var reg = /^([A-Za-z0-9_\-\.\+])+\@([A-Za-z0-9_\-\.])+\.([A-Za-z]{2,4})$/;

        if (reg.test(emailField.value) == false) 
        {
            return false;
        }

        return true;

}

function postFormData(formData) {

   var emailSw =    document.getElementById('emailField').value;  
 console.log('formData: ' + JSON.stringify(formData));
  $.ajax({
     url: '<ctrl:var name="formHandler" />?m=postData',
     data: formData,
     type: 'post',
     dataType: 'json',
     success: function(data) {

        console.log('result: ' + JSON.stringify(data));
        
        if (data.redirectUrl) { // last page
            _satellite.track("USPolymersFormComplete", {
                                    email: emailSw // xxxx should be replaced by email ID
                      });
           $('html').hide();
           window.location.replace(data.redirectUrl);
        } else {

        //window.scrollTo(0, 0); // scroll to top
        if (data.sk) {
           $('#sk').val(data.sk); //for resolved records
        }
        if (data.createLeadEmail) {
           $('#createLeadEmail').val(data.createLeadEmail); // temp store to create Lead record
        }
          
        $('#FirstName').val(data.displayFields[0].fieldValue);
        $('#LastName').val(data.displayFields[1].fieldValue);
        $('#currPage').val(1); // update currPage

        for (var obj in data.displayFields) {

          var field = data.displayFields[obj];
          var fieldName = field.fieldName;

          $('.' + fieldName).show();
          $('.' + fieldName).prop('required',true);
         // $('#emailConsent').prop('required',true);
        
    
        }
        $('#msg').show();
        $('#msg').text(data.message);

        if ($('#currPage').val()==1) {
           $('.consent').show();
           $('.unsubscribe').show();
           $('#submit').show();
        }

       }

      }

   })

}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">_satellite.pageBottom();</script>
     

  
    </body>
</html>

<script>



var form = document.getElementById('progForm');

$(document).ready(function() {
  $('#submit').click(function() {

   var reqFieldsCount = 0;
   var compFieldsCount = 0;
   var countCheckboxes = 0;
   var compCheckboxCount = 0;
    
   for(var i=0; i < form.elements.length; i++){
      // count all required fields on curr page
      if (form.elements[i].hasAttribute('required')) {

         reqFieldsCount += 1;
      }
      // count completed fields
      if(form.elements[i].value != '' && form.elements[i].hasAttribute('required')){

        //console.log('completed form.elements[i].value: ' + form.elements[i].value );
         //at least 1 checkbox field

         //count checkbox fields
         if (form.elements[i].type == 'checkbox') {
            countCheckboxes +=1
         }


         if (form.elements[i].type == 'checkbox' && form.elements[i].checked == true) { // checkbox fields
            compCheckboxCount +=1

         } else if (form.elements[i].type != 'checkbox') { // other fields
            compFieldsCount += 1;              
         }

       }
    }

   // add diff of unchecked checkboxes, as only 1 is required
   if (compCheckboxCount>0){
      compFieldsCount += (countCheckboxes - compCheckboxCount) + compCheckboxCount;  
   }

    // console.log('form.elements.length: ' + form.elements.length );
    // console.log('countCheckboxes: ' + countCheckboxes );
    // console.log('compCheckboxCount: ' + compCheckboxCount );
    // console.log('reqFieldsCount: ' + reqFieldsCount);
    // console.log('compFieldsCount: ' + compFieldsCount);

   // only post if all req fields are completed
   if (reqFieldsCount===compFieldsCount) { 

   // remove duplicate names for checkboxes and combine to single field

   var checkboxNames = ['MC_Conversion_Type__c']
   var c;

    for (c of checkboxNames) {

      var checkboxName = c;
      console.log('checkbox: '+ checkboxName);

      var productTypes = document.forms['progForm'].elements[checkboxName];

      var val = '';
      
      for (var i=0, len=productTypes.length; i<len; i++) {
          var id = checkboxName+'-'+(i+1);
          var checkbox = document.getElementById(id);
          $('.checkbox').addClass('submitting');
              checkbox.parentNode.removeChild(checkbox); 
          if (checkbox.checked==true) {
            val += checkbox.value + ';';
          }

      }

      var input = document.createElement('input');
      input.type ='hidden'
      input.name = c
      input.value = val;
      form.appendChild(input);

    }
     
     // Ankit Changes
    var otherChallenges =  document.getElementById("childInput").value;
    var mainChallenges =  document.getElementById("MC_Main_Challenges__c").value;
    console.log("mainChallenges: ",mainChallenges);
    console.log("otherChallenges: ",otherChallenges);
      if(otherChallenges == null || otherChallenges == '' || mainChallenges != "Other"){
         var element = document.getElementById("parentInput");
          var child=document.getElementById("childInput");
          element.removeChild(child);
      }else if(mainChallenges == "Other" && (otherChallenges != null || otherChallenges != '')){
        console.log("Inside this");
        var element = document.getElementById("MC_Main_Challenges__c");
         element.parentNode.removeChild(element);
      }
     
     // Changes end
      
    $('#submit').attr('disabled', true).val('Submitting').fadeTo('fast', 0.6);

    //stop form validation as this is false/positive for checkbox
    $("#progForm").attr('novalidate', 'novalidate');

    var formData = $('#progForm').serialize();
    //console.log('Posting the following: ' + formData);

    postFormData(formData);

    }

  })

})



function validateEmail(emailField){
        var reg = /^([A-Za-z0-9_\-\.\+])+\@([A-Za-z0-9_\-\.])+\.([A-Za-z]{2,4})$/;

        if (reg.test(emailField.value) == false) 
        {
            return false;
        }

        return true;

}

function postFormData(formData) {

   var emailSw =    document.getElementById('emailField').value;  
 console.log('formData: ' + JSON.stringify(formData));
  $.ajax({
     url: '<ctrl:var name="formHandler" />?m=postData',
     data: formData,
     type: 'post',
     dataType: 'json',
     success: function(data) {

        console.log('result: ' + JSON.stringify(data));
        
        if (data.redirectUrl) { // last page
            _satellite.track("USPolymersFormComplete", {
                                    email: emailSw // xxxx should be replaced by email ID
                      });
           $('html').hide();
           window.location.replace(data.redirectUrl);
        } else {

        //window.scrollTo(0, 0); // scroll to top
        if (data.sk) {
           $('#sk').val(data.sk); //for resolved records
        }
        if (data.createLeadEmail) {
           $('#createLeadEmail').val(data.createLeadEmail); // temp store to create Lead record
        }
          
        $('#FirstName').val(data.displayFields[0].fieldValue);
        $('#LastName').val(data.displayFields[1].fieldValue);
        $('#currPage').val(1); // update currPage

        for (var obj in data.displayFields) {

          var field = data.displayFields[obj];
          var fieldName = field.fieldName;

          $('.' + fieldName).show();
          $('.' + fieldName).prop('required',true);
         // $('#emailConsent').prop('required',true);
        
    
        }
        $('#msg').show();
        $('#msg').text(data.message);

        if ($('#currPage').val()==1) {
           $('.consent').show();
           $('.unsubscribe').show();
           $('#submit').show();
        }

       }

      }

   })

}

</script>

<script type="text/javascript">_satellite.pageBottom();</script>
     

  
    </body>
</html>
